name: nfcriv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wi(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wi(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

comment: Consequence of the not-free predicate, similiar to ~ nfcri . Requires ` y ` and ` A ` be disjoint, but is not based on ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2023.)
